dictionary.lore: An amulet called the "Crown Light," named after one of the two lights said to be given off by kings. It is said that this light has the power to protect the ruler of the world from all deadly poisons, illnesses, and curses. On the back of the amulet is inscribed its creator's name, Luva, along with a quote from him which reads, "Median, it's impossible to create a world of peace on ideals alone."
